doranode:math.add.title: Addition
doranode:math.add.description: Adds input A to input B.

doranode:math.sub.title: Subtraction
doranode:math.sub.description: Subtracts input B from input A.

doranode:math.div.title: Division
doranode:math.div.description: Divides input B from input A.

doranode:math.mul.title: Multiplication
doranode:math.mul.description: Multiplies input A to input B,

doranode:math.sqrt.title: Square Root
doranode:math.sqrt.description: Calculates the square root of input A.

doranode:math.nthroot.title: Root
doranode:math.nthroot.description: Calculates the Bth nthroot of input A.

doranode:math.pow.title: Power
doranode:math.pow.description: Raises input A to the power of input B.

doranode:io.input_int.title: Integer Input
doranode:io.input_int.description: Gets textbox input and converts it to a int type

doranode:io.input_float.title: Decimal Input
doranode:io.input_float.description: Gets textbox input and converts it to a float type

doranode:io.input_str.title: String Input
doranode:io.input_str.description: Gets textbox input and converts it to a string type

doranode:io.output.title: Output
doranode:io.output.description: Gets the input and shows it in the textbox

doranode:io.title: Input / Output
doranode:io.description: Nodes for getting input from user and showing output

gui.window.title: Doranode Visual Programing Tool
gui.dialog.about.title: About Doranode
gui.dialog.about.content: Doranode is a tool for visual programming.

gui.dialog.file.open.title: Open File
